column4: ok need help I can connect to my router wireless running ubuntu 8.04 livecd, but cannot do so with my hard disk ubuntu....eveidnetly something must be mess up in my ubuntu hd.....can i reinstall just NM or something
that will reset everything and ask me for the password and keyring
hae you not tried to edit the connection properties and delete the wireless entry for your wifi router yet ?
